project_descr: Capacity Development of the Human Rights Commission of the Maldives

outputs.output_title: Support to the Human Rights Co
outputs.output_descr: First project supporting the HRCM was entitled "Support to Human Rights Commission of the Maldives". This project from 2006-2009  focused largely on institutional development of HRCM. Building on the first project, a second phase of the project was initiated from May 2010. The second project is entitled "Capacity Development of the Human Rights Commission of the Maldives". This project focuses on further strengthening capacity of the HRCM. While there is an emphasis on staff development via a comprehensive training plan based on a professional needs assessment, project activities are also designed to support the HRCM's human rights programmes.

project_title: support to the human rights commission
